altername_name: Aoki Ookami to Shiroki Mejika: Genchou Hishi
Genghis Khan II: Clan of the Gray Wolf
name: Aokiohkami to Shirokimejika: Genchohishi
overview: As in the first part you could participate in two conquests: Mongol conquest and world conquest. In the first you must unite all the little tribes of the country. The world conquest is more complex: You must use all your senses to make the world as you wish.
